text: Roman Eduardovich Minayev (; born 24 December 1997) is a Russian football player. He plays for FC Arsenal Tula. ==Club career== He made his debut in the Russian Professional Football League for FC Avangard Kursk on 20 July 2016 in a game against FC Energomash Belgorod. He made his Russian Football National League debut for Avangard on 22 July 2017 in a game against PFC Krylia Sovetov Samara. On 4 February 2020, he signed a 2.5-year contract with Russian Premier League club FC Arsenal Tula. He made his Russian Premier League debut for the club on 20 June 2020 in a game against FC Spartak Moscow. ==References== ==External links== * * * * Profile by Russian Professional Football League Category:1997 births Category:People from Kursk Category:Living people Category:Russian footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:FC Avangard Kursk players Category:FC Arsenal Tula players Category:Russian Premier League players
title: Roman Minayev
